backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend canister with user profile CRUD, video upload/purchase logic, and access-controlled endpoints using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the admin-only 'Admin Dashboard' button on the Profile page (for secret username SHUBOWNER2026) is implemented in ProfilePage.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each page or component's purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Streamora SPA, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app file that builds the TanStack Router route tree with auth guards, admin guards, theme sync, and all page routes wrapped in authenticated or admin layouts.
frontend/src/components/AdSlot.tsx: Reusable ad placeholder component that displays a mock advertisement with an optional countdown timer and skip button after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsCard.ts: Presentational card component for displaying a single analytics metric with a label, value, optional icon, and optional colored badge.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Fixed top navigation header with the Streamora logo, a debounced search input with live suggestion dropdown, and navigation to search results or video detail pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Layout wrapper for authenticated pages that composes AppHeader, a main content area with top/bottom padding, and BottomNav.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with links to Home, Shorts, Upload, Notifications, and Profile, highlighting the active route and showing an unread notification badge.
frontend/src/components/EmbedVideoPlayer: Renders an embedded iframe video player for YouTube or Rumble URLs, converting the URL to an embed format via a utility function.
Displays a 'Go Premium' button that shows a timed popup with pricing details and a contact email when clicked, auto-dismissing after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/MonetizationBadg: Small badge component that displays a checkmark icon to indicate a monetized creator, with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/NotificationItem: Renders a single notification item with category-specific icons and colors (payment, monetization, strike, general), marking it as read on click.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Displays a styled crown badge indicating Premium or Lifetime Premium membership status.
frontend/src/components/StrikeWarning.ts: Shows an alert banner with escalating warning messages based on the number of strikes (1–3) a user has received.
frontend/src/components/TrustedBadge.tsx: Renders a small 'Trusted Creator' badge with a shield icon and blue styling.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail card with title, uploader name, view count, and upload time, linking to the video detail page.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom HTML5 video player with ad phase management (pre-roll, mid-roll, end-roll) for non-premium users, including play/pause, mute, seek, and fullscreen controls.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication context with session state, login/logout actions, admin flag, and active site event, persisting session via local storage utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all major data operations (videos, user stats, notifications, monetization/payout requests) using localStorage-backed store functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind with OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for dark/light theming, and defines utility classes for branding, glass effects, and scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/auth.ts: Implements a localStorage/sessionStorage-based username and password authentication system with user registration, login, session management, and a hardcoded admin account.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Provides a localStorage-backed data store with CRUD functions for videos, comments, notifications, monetization requests, payout requests, user stats, site events, and subscriptions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports utility functions for class name merging, number/currency formatting, relative time display, and converting YouTube/Rumble URLs to embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutMonetizationPage: Displays the Streamora Creator Program info page, including eligibility criteria (100 subscribers, 1K views), Standard (55%) and Premium (70%) revenue share plans, and a CTA to apply for monetization.
frontend/src/pages/AdminCreatorManagemen: Admin page for searching users and editing their creator settings (CPM rank, premium status, trusted status, monetization approval), sending notifications on status changes, and saving updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin control panel dashboard showing summary stats (total users, pending monetization requests, pending payouts) and navigation links to all admin sub-pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEmbedVideoPage.t: Admin form page for embedding external YouTube or Rumble videos into the platform, with fields for URL, title, thumbnail, description, tags, and a promoted toggle.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEventControlPage: Admin page for starting and stopping site-wide themed events (Holiday, Dark Mode, Golden), applying the corresponding CSS theme class to the document body and persisting the active event state.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMonetizationRequ: Admin page for reviewing monetization requests, allowing admins to approve or reject them, which updates user stats and sends notifications accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNotificationSend: Admin page with a form to send categorized notifications to all users or a specific user, using a target selector, category dropdown, and message textarea.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPayoutRequestsPa: Admin page for reviewing payout requests, allowing admins to approve or reject them with corresponding user notifications and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminStrikesPanelPage: Admin page for issuing strikes to users by searching and selecting them; strike 3 deletes all their videos and disables monetization at strike 2.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserStatsEditorP: Admin page for searching users and editing their stats (views, subscribers, earnings, toggles) with a form that saves changes via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: User-facing analytics dashboard displaying views, subscribers, earnings, CPM rank, and ad eligibility, with a payout request button available when earnings reach $100.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a grid of admin-promoted featured videos fetched via `useHomeFeed`, showing skeletons while loading and an empty state when no videos exist.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login form that authenticates users via `loginUser`, stores session with `useAuth`, and redirects admins to `/admin` and regular users to `/home`.
frontend/src/pages/LongVideoMetadataPage: Step 2 of the long-video upload flow; collects title, description, tags, and thumbnail, then saves the video record and navigates to the user's profile.
frontend/src/pages/MonetizationPage.tsx: Monetization settings page that lets eligible users request monetization, enter PayPal email and Ad PIN to activate it, and displays current monetization status if already active.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists the current user's notifications with unread count badge, skeleton loading state, and calls `useMarkNotificationRead` when a notification is tapped.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing avatar, badges, subscriber/view/video counts, and tabbed video lists; supports both own-profile actions (logout, settings) and viewing other users' profiles.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Renders search results for a query string taken from URL search params using `useSearchVideos`, with skeleton loading and an empty state for no matches.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Displays a vertical short-video feed with swipe-style navigation; each ShortCard handles play/pause, like, comment, subscribe, share, and mute interactions using local state and store utilities.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration form page that validates user input, calls registerUser, logs the user in via AuthContext, and redirects to /home on success.
frontend/src/pages/UploadLongVideoPage.t: Step 1 of a two-step long-video upload flow; provides a drag-and-drop file picker with simulated upload progress and stores the resulting object URL in sessionStorage before proceeding.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Landing page for content upload that presents two options—long video and short—navigating to their respective upload sub-routes, plus a guidelines section.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortsPage.tsx: Single-step short video upload form that collects a video file, title, description, and tags, simulates upload progress, and saves the video record via the useSaveVideo mutation before navigating to /shorts.
frontend/src/pages/VideoDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for a single video that renders the appropriate player (embedded or direct), handles view tracking, likes, subscriptions, comments, and displays creator stats with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including fonts, OKLCH-based color palette, border radii, shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for Streamora describing its architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioned feature list for a mobile-first video sharing app with admin controls and Supabase storage.
